original: The $NAME|Y$ Trade Node has no outgoing routes.\nPlease select a node with outgoing routes to edit Trade Routes.
translation: $NAME|Y$这个贸易节点没有外流路线。\n请选择一个带有下游节点的节点，以管理你的贸易流。

original: $GOODS|Y$ is a latent resource in this province. It might become available at a later date.
translation: 这个省有潜在的$GOODS|Y$资源。也许未来它将派上用场。

original: Entrepreneurs in this province have started to adapt the Atmospheric engine, greatly increasing the output of local mines.
translation: 该省的企业家已经开始适应使用大气机，这大大提高了当地矿山的产量。

original: Entrepreneurs in this province have started to use Coke Blast furnaces in local iron production, greatly increasing productivity.
translation: 该省的企业家已经开始在当地的冶铁生产中使用焦炭高炉，这大大提高了生产率。

original: The lighter and more efficient Swing Plough has greatly increased productivity in this region.
translation: 更轻便、更有效的摆杆步犁大大的提高了该地区的生产力。

original: The introduction of the Flying Shuttle has greatly increased the efficiency of weavers in this region, even if it has also resulted in some unrest among the local artisans.
translation: 飞梭的引进大大提高了这个地区织布工人的效率，尽管它也造成了当地手工艺人之间的一些不安。

original: The Spinning Jenny is quickly being adopted by the weavers in this province. This is greatly increasing their output even though there has also been some unrest among those who feel threathened by this development.
translation: 珍妮纺织机很快就被这个省的织工采用了。这大大增加了他们的产出，尽管对这一发展感到不安的人认为是受到了威胁。

original: The adoption of the modern Steam Engine is pushing the development of this province forward rapidly.
translation: 现代蒸汽机的使用正在迅速地促进该省的发展。

original: Initiatives to aid the flow of goods within this province has finally made local businesses able to grow and thrive.
translation: 帮助该省内商品流动的举措终于使当地企业得以发展壮大。

original: This province is benefitting greatly from advances made in agricultural technology and methodology.
translation: 该省受益于农业技术与方法的进步。

original: This province has seen a great influx of people from the surrounding countryside.
translation: 这个省份有大量来自周边乡村的人涌入。

original: The growing economy in this province is attracting people from all over the country. This is a boon in many ways but it has also led to some unrest as workers try to live together in very cramped areas of the city.
translation: 这个省份日益增长的经济正在吸引全国各地的人们。这在很多方面都是好事，但也导致了一些动乱，因为工人们试图在城市的狭小地区共同生活。

original: This province has grown into a major center of production for metal after the introduction of coal driven machinery.
translation: 在引进煤炭动力机械后，该省已成为金属生产的主要中心。

original: This province has grown into a major center for the production of textiles.
translation: 这个省份已经成为了我们的纺织业中心。

original: This province has grown into a major center for industrial shipbuilding.
translation: 这个省份已经成为了我们的造船业中心。

original: We have made a number of concessions to placate the unruly artisans of this province, protecting their work at the cost of more modern competition.
translation: 我们作出了一系列让步措施来安抚该省不安分的工匠，保障他们的工作以更具现代化的方式进行。

original: The local crafts sector is suffering greatly from the competition of recent developments in production technology. Artisans are finding themselves unable to feed their families and are leaving the area in search for new lives elsewhere.
translation: 当地手工艺部门正受到最近生产技术发展的竞争。工匠们发现自己无法养活自己的家人，他们正离开这个地区，到别处寻找新的生活。

original: Local industrialists have been mandated to pay for the restoration of this province after the spread of a dangerous fire from a local factory.
translation: 当地工厂发生危急火情之后，该工厂厂主被要求赔偿该地区的重建费用。

original: Building on older experimental air pumps an inventor from [invention_province.GetName] has created a new type of engine that uses steam pressure to pump water out of wet mines. The Atmospheric engine now enables mining where it was previously not possible and has greatly increased the efficiency of coal and metal mines in our country.
translation: 在旧的试验型空气泵的基础上，来自[invention_province.GetName]的一位发明家发明了一种使用蒸汽压力驱动为潮湿的矿井排水的新型引擎。蒸汽机让过去无法开采的矿区可以被开采，同时极大地提高了我国煤矿和金属矿的开采效率。

original: An exciting future lies ahead of us.
§YCoal§!, §YIron§! and §YCopper§! provinces are now more likely to trigger industrialization events.
translation: 拥有§Y煤矿§!，§Y铁矿§!或§Y铜矿§!的省份现在更可能触发工业化事件。

original: [Root.inventor_name.GetName], an inventor and entrepreneur from [invention_province.GetName] has come up with a new type of coke-fired blast furnace for the production of cast iron. By making use of coal instead of charcoal the production of Iron has been increased greatly, allowing us to supply the market with larger quantities of cheap iron.
translation: 来自[invention_province.GetName]的发明家兼企业家[Root.inventor_name.GetName]发明了一种用于生产铸铁的新型焦炭高炉。 通过利用煤炭代替木炭，铁的产量大幅度增加，使我们能够向市场供应更多的廉价铁。

original: Abraham Darby, an inventor and entrepreneur has come up with a new type of coke-fired blast furnace for the production of cast iron. By making use of coal instead of charcoal the production of Iron has been increased greatly, allowing us to supply the market with larger quantities of cheap iron.
translation: 发明家兼企业家亚伯拉罕·达比(AbrahamDarby)发明了一种用于生产铸铁的新型焦炭高炉。通过利用煤炭代替木炭，铁的产量大幅度增加，使我们能够向市场供应更多的廉价铁。

original: §YCoal§! and §YIron§! provinces are now more likely to trigger industrialization events.
translation: 拥有§Y煤矿§!和§Y铁矿§!的省份现在更容易引发工业化事件。

original: Improving upon the design for earlier atmospheric engines the entrepreneur and inventor [Root.inventor_name.GetName] has managed to create a new type of machine that makes use of a separate condenser and a rotary motion instead of the oscillating one of previous engines. Operating at just above the atmospheric pressure the [Root.inventor_name.GetName] Steam Engine promises to be twice as productive as earlier models and will prove invaluable as a means to drive machinery in all types of industrial enterprises.
translation: 企业家和发明家[Root.inventor_name.GetName]在早期蒸汽机的设计上进行改进，发明了一种使用分离冷凝器和曲柄传动的新型号来代替往复直线传动的旧型蒸汽机。在略高于一个大气压的蒸汽压力下操作时，[Root.inventor_name.GetName]的蒸汽机承诺的生产效率是早期型号的两倍，这种新型蒸汽机对于工厂来说将会是无价的。

original: Improving upon the design for earlier atmospheric engines the entrepreneur and inventor James Watt has managed to create a new type of machine that makes use of a separate condenser and a rotary motion instead of the oscillating one of previous engines. Operating at just above the atmospheric pressure the Watt Steam Engine promises to be twice as productive as earlier models and will prove invaluable as a means to drive machinery in all types of industrial enterprises.
translation: 企业家和发明家詹姆斯·瓦特在早期蒸汽机的设计上进行改进，发明了一种使用分离冷凝器和曲柄传动的新型号来代替往复直线传动的旧型蒸汽机。在略高于一个大气压的蒸汽压力下操作时，瓦特的蒸汽机承诺的生产效率是早期型号的两倍，这种新型蒸汽机对于工厂来说将会是无价的。

original: Provinces are now more likely to trigger industrialization events.
translation: 省份将会更容易触发工业化事件。

original: Experimenting with new shapes and an iron covered mouldboard a local inventor from [invention_province.GetName], [Root.inventor_name.GetName], has created a much lighter plough that is easier and more efficient to work with. Together with other recent inventions in the field of farming tools the new plough promises to greatly increase the productivity of agriculture in our country.
translation: 通过尝试新的造形并在犁板上覆铁，来自[invention_province.GetName]的当地发明家[Root.inventor_name.GetName]创造了一种更轻的犁，使用起来更容易，效率更高。与农具领域的其他新发明一起，这种新型犁有望大大提高我国的农业生产力。

original: Provinces are now more likely to trigger industrialization events.
translation: 省份将会更容易触发工业化事件。

original: [Root.inventor_name.GetName], a local inventor from [invention_province.GetName] has patented a new design for a 'wheeled' shuttle that he promises to revolutionize weaving by eliminating the need for a second person to catch the shuttle as it passes through the warp threads. While productivity is still limited by the rate at which thread can be spun, already a major bottleneck in textile production, the shuttle is quickly spreading to weavers all over the country.
translation: [Root.inventor_name.GetName]，一个来自 [invention_province.GetName]的本地发明家，申请了一种“轮式”梭子的设计专利，他的新型梭子不再需要第二名工人在梭子穿过经纱时抓住它。虽然生产效率仍然受到纺丝速度这一主要瓶颈的限制，但是这种梭子正迅速向全国各地的纺织商推广。

original: If only our spinners could keep up...
translation: 要是我们的纺纱工能跟进就好了……

original: Provinces that produce §YWool§!, §YCloth§!, §YSilk§! or §YCotton§!, are now more likely to trigger industrialization events.
translation: 生产§Y羊毛§!、§Y布料§!、§Y丝绸§!或§Y棉花§!的省份现在更有可能引发工业化事件。

original: A major limitation for weaving productivity has long been the rate at which thread can be spun. Even before the introduction of the flying shuttle, one weaver required four spinners to service him. To overcome this hurdle [Root.inventor_name.GetName], an inventor from [invention_province.GetName], has devised a machine allowing one worker to do the work of many spinners. Together with the flying shuttle this machine promises to greatly improve the efficiency of weaving in the near future.
translation: 长期以来，纺织生产效率一直受到纺丝速度的限制。在引进飞梭以前，四名纺纱工所纺织的纱仅能供一名织布工使用。为了克服这一障碍，[Root.inventor_name.GetName]，一名来自[invention_province.GetName]的本地发明家设计了一台机器，允许一名工人完成多名纺纱工的工作。这台机器有望在不久的将来与飞梭一起大大提高纺织机的效率。

original: Provinces that produce §YWool§!, §YCloth§!, §YSilk§! or §YCotton§!, are now more likely to trigger industrialization events.
translation: 生产§Y羊毛§!，§Y布料§!，§Y丝绸§!或§Y棉花§!的省份，更有可能触发工业化事件。

original: Bad roads have long been a limiting factor for economic growth in [industrial_province.GetName], severely hampering the transfer of goods, people and capital. Looking to other areas local entrepreneurs have begun to introduce toll roads to pay for maintenance and there are far gone plans of building transportation canals to further ease the local flow of goods.
translation: 糟糕的道路一直以来限制了[industrial_province.GetName]的经济增长，严重阻碍了货物、人员和资本的流通。 渴望在其他地区拓展商机的当地企业家已经开始引入收费公路来支付道路的保养费用，并且已经制定了建立运河，进一步改善当地物流的规划。

original: A worthy goal, they will have our patronage!
translation: 这是一个有价值的目标，他们将会得到我们的赞助！

original: Great initiative but nothing for the state to engage in.
translation: 这是一个很好的倡议，但没有国家介入的空间。

original: Taking the lessons of the enlightenment to heart a group of noble landowners have begun to work at improving the efficiency of agriculture. Pioneering inventions in how to use machinery for seed distribution, new crops, new forms of land rotation and breeding the local landowners of [agricultural_province.GetName] have been able to greatly improve the local output of food.
translation: 将启蒙运动的思想牢记于心，一群贵族地主开始致力于提高农业效率。开创性的发明了如何利用机械进行种子分配、新作物、新形式的土地轮作并教授 [agricultural_province.GetName] 的土地所有者，这极大地提升了当地食物的产出。

original: A great precedent for others to follow.
translation: 一个可以让他人借鉴的好例子

original: By employing recent technological innovations in the field of machinery, local entrepreneurs have begun to greatly improve their output in [industrialization_province.GetName]. As a result many now travel to the province from the surrounding countryside, eager to seek new work in the growing city of [industrialization_province.GetCapitalName].
translation: 通过最近在机械领域的技术革新，当地企业家已经开始大幅度提高其在[industrialization_province.GetName]的产量。结果引来许多周边乡村的人，渴望在 成长中的城市[industrialization_province.GetCapitalName]获得新工作。

original: [industrialization_province.GetCapitalName] will be a great home for them.

Through the use of modern machinery and working methods the local weaving business of [industrialization_province.GetName] has grown into a much more large scale business. Where once only simple fabric was exported there is now a thriving cloth production sector, greatly helping the local economy.\nHowever, not everyone is happy about this development and the artisans of [old_cloth_province.GetName] have petitioned the [old_cloth_province.Owner.GetAdjective] authorities to crack down on these ‘low quality products’ that they believe to be flooding the market.
translation: 通过使用现代机器和工作方式， [industrialization_province.GetName]当地的纺织作坊已成长为庞大的企业。曾经只是出口简单织物而现在已经有成熟的服装生产行业，有效的促进当地经济的发展。\n然而，不是每一个人都对发展感到快乐。[old_cloth_province.GetName]的工匠们请愿 [old_cloth_province.Owner.GetAdjective]执权部门制裁这些在市场泛滥的“低质量”产品

original: For some time local [industrialization_province.GetName] mills have been producing smaller quantities of paper. Using new production techniques, the paper makers have expanded their business, allowing the local economy to blossom. Soon paper might even rise to be the main export of the province!
translation: 一段时间以来，[industrialization_province.GetName]当地的造纸厂一直在生产数量较少的纸张。利用新的生产技术，造纸厂扩大了业务范围，使当地经济蓬勃发展。很快，纸甚至可能成为该省的主要出口品！

original: [glass_province.GetName] has always had some local production of forest glass but with the advances in glass production of late this province has grown into a promising center of local business. Given the right support, glass could rise to be the main export of the area.
translation: 生产森林玻璃一直是[glass_province.GetName]地区的传统。随着后来玻璃生产行业的进步，这个省已经发展成为一个很有前途的地方商业中心。如果得到适当的支持，玻璃可能成为该省的主要出口产品。

original: The growing economy of [urbanization_province.GetName] is attracting people from the entire [Root.GovernmentName] to the province. A steady trickle of people are leaving the countryside to seek out new work opportunities and a new life in the city of [urbanization_province.GetCapitalName].
translation: [urbanization_province.GetName]不断增长的经济吸引着从整个[Root.GovernmentName]到该省的人们。越来越多的人离开农村，到[urbanization_province.GetCapitalName]寻找新的工作机会和新的生活。

original: The introduction of modern industrial machinery such as Coke, steam powered railways and pumps have contributed greatly to the growth of the local economy in [iron_province.GetName]. The local Metalworks are now among the finer in the region.
translation: 现代工业机械如焦炭、蒸汽火车铁路和水泵的引进，极大地促进了[iron_province.GetName]当地经济的增长。当地的金属工厂现在是该地区最精良的工厂之一。

original: This is the dawn of a new era.

Rising demand for textiles and the adoption of new methods and machinery has allowed the Textile sector in [textile_province.GetName] to grow and thrive in the last few years. This has in turn resulted in an economic upturn for the entire region, and many are now moving from the countryside to the new factories.
translation: 对纺织品的需求不断增加以及新技术和新机器的采用，使[textile_province.GetName]的纺织部门在过去几年里得以发展壮大。这反过来又导致整个地区的经济好转，许多人现在正从农村迁往新工厂。

original: These looms will clothe the nation.
translation: 这些纺织机将会衣冠整个国家。

original: New advances in work organization, as well as technical innovations, has led to rapid growth for the Shipyards of [ship_province.GetName]. Ships and naval supplies are now produced more efficiently, and as a result of this economic upswing the province is attracting more people to work in the local shipyards.
translation: 工作组织的新进步以及技术创新，引起了[ship_province.GetName]船厂的快速增长。船只和海军物资现在生产效率更高，由于经济的增长，该省正在吸引更多的人到当地造船厂工作。
对新的生产技术的敌意

original: The changes in production methods that technological progress has brought have not been welcomed by everyone. Some feel that their livelihood is threatened by the growing mechanization and are causing trouble through protests and sabotage. In [luddite_province.GetName] things have even escalated into a full blown uprising among the artisans.
translation: 技术进步改变的的生产方式并未受到所有人的欢迎。 有些人认为他们的生计受到日益机械化的威胁，并且通过抗议和破坏活动造成麻烦。 在[luddite_province.GetName]事件甚至升级为工匠们的全面暴动。

original: New production methods has led to the rise of a promising textile industry in our country. However, this growth has left many old artisan families behind. Many are now poor and have to seek a much less profitable job in the growing industry.
translation: 新的生产方式让我国的纺织业得以兴起。然而，这种兴起导致了许多手工艺人家庭的衰弱。他们中的许多人现在很穷，不得不在新兴的行业中寻找一份利润更低的工作。

original: Such is the way of things.
Let us do what we can to support these people.
translation: 让我们竭尽所能来支援这些人吧。

original: The city of [disease_province.GetCapitalName] has seen immense growth over the last few years and the once so ambitious plan for the city has been entirely subverted. Many live in shanty towns with very poor sanitation. Disease is now spreading rapidly in the city.
translation: 在过去的几年里， [disease_province.GetCapitalName]经济发展迅猛，吸引了大量人口。但是雄心勃勃的城市建筑发展规划却没能兑现。许多人住在卫生条件极差的棚户区。 疾病在城市迅速蔓延。

original: There is nothing we can do.

New technology has allowed the mines of [mining_province.GetName] to be greatly expanded and they now operate at an efficiency that would have shocked our ancestors.\nThe new machinery is not without its risks, however. An explosion in a local mine has led to a cave-in that trapped many miners as well as causing a major production set back.
translation: 新技术已经使得[mining_province.GetName]的矿山得到了很大的扩展，现在它们的运行效率会让我们的祖先感到震惊。\n然而，新机器并不是没有风险的。 当地矿场的一场爆炸导致许多困于井下的矿工陷入困境，并造成了重大的生产倒退。

original: A fire that started in a local factory has quickly spread among the cramped houses of [fire_province.GetCapitalName] and devastated the city. Some see this as yet another problem with the growing urbanisation and industrialization of our time.
translation: 当地一家工厂发生的火灾迅速蔓延到拥挤的[fire_province.GetCapitalName]的房屋中，并摧毁了这座城市。一些人认为，随着我们时代城市化和工业化的发展，这是另一个隐患。

original: Factory owners must contribute to rebuilding the city.
translation: 工厂主们必须为重建城市做些什么。

original: We must help these poor people.
translation: 我们必须帮帮这些穷人。

original: Our policy of extracting raw materials from our far-away provinces to fuel the industrialization in our homeland has resulted in a crushing economic development in the [overseas_production_province.GetAreaName] area. Despite a proud history of [overseas_production_province.GetFancyTradeGood] the region has now been reduced to exporting unrefined products, little more than raw material for others to rework.
translation: 我们从偏远省份开采原材料以促进祖国工业化的政策，导致了[overseas_production_province.GetAreaName]的经济破坏性发展。尽管有着自豪历史的[overseas_production_province.GetFancyTradeGood]已经减少了未提炼产品的出口，然而只不过是其他人返工的原材料而已
我们必须支持本地工匠

original: Anglicanism is a form of Protestantism in which the head of state is also the Supreme Governor of the Church. Theologically and institutionally, Anglicanism retains many elements of Catholicism while also being influenced by Reformed Puritans and continental Protestants.
translation: 英国圣公会是一种新教形式，国家元首也是教会的最高领袖。在神学和制度上，英国圣公会保留了许多天主教的元素，同时也受到改革清教徒和大陆新教徒的影响。

original: The monarch is concerned that his consort has failed to give him a suitable heir. She needs to go.
translation: 君主忧虑他的配偶没有给他生出一个合适的继承人。 她必须离开。

original: There are many eligible bachelorettes in the nation willing to marry our monarch. Given our current lack of a consort, we should consider this pool of suitors.
translation: 全国有许多合格的未婚女子愿意嫁给我们的君主。鉴于我们目前缺少配偶，我们应该考虑这一群追求者。

original: Papist monasticism is outdated and heretical. We must dissolve more of the remaining nonconformist religious houses, strip them of their lands, and confiscate their valuables.
translation: 天主教隐修制度是过时且异端的。我们必须解散更多尚不信奉国教的修道院，剥夺他们的土地，没收他们的财产。

original: Monopoly charters should be awarded only to loyal and faithful men who conform to Church doctrine.
translation: 垄断特许证只应授予符合教义的忠诚忠实的人。

original: Parading the Supreme Governor, also the head of state, around the country boosts the public spirit and encourages loyalty.
translation: 在全国各地接受检阅的最高总督，同时也是国家元首，增强了公众的精神，并鼓励忠诚。

original: Following the destruction and removal of Papist symbols, Anglican churches were left somewhat bare of decoration. It has been decreed that in place of these blasphemous icons, the Royal Arms of [Root.Monarch.GetName] is to be displayed. The presence of the Royal Arms cements in the public consciousness the reality of the new order; that [Root.Monarch.GetName] is appointed by God not only as [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] of $COUNTRY$, but also as Supreme Governor of the Church.
translation: 随着天主教符号的毁坏与去除，圣公宗的教堂变得缺少装饰。已经下达的旨意要求，[Root.Monarch.GetName]的纹章将取代这些渎神画像。皇家纹章的出现将会使民众确实认知到新秩序的现实：[Root.Monarch.GetName]不仅仅被上帝指派为$COUNTRY$的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，同时也是国教最高领袖。

original: Display the Royal Arms proudly in every church.
translation: 在每个教堂里骄傲地悬挂皇家纹章。

original:
Attending Anglican services is mandatory in the [Root.GovernmentName] of $COUNTRY$. Recusancy is punishable by harsh fines. A person found guilty must forfeit all their goods and chattels, their lands, tenements, and hereditaments, and all of their rents and annuities. Enforcement, however, is difficult due to the sheer number of potential recusants, and so we should focus our efforts on the most concerning offenders.

Popery is a particularly heinous crime. As the Pope denies the legitimacy of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], so too must faithful Catholics, and thus all Catholics may be considered traitors to the state.

Radical nonconformists such as the Puritans may also be targeted by these laws should they stray too far from the established doctrines of the Church.

The law enforces the uniformity of religious belief in $COUNTRY$, but it might also be used to discourage factionalism within the court. The mere suggestion of recusancy can destroy one’s reputation at court.
translation:
出席圣公宗的礼拜仪式在 $COUNTRY$[Root.GovernmentName] 是强制性的。不服国教者将会被施以严厉的处罚。一个被判有罪的人会被没收他们的货物，动产，土地，房产，可继承财产，地租和年金。然而，由于潜在的叛徒实在太多了，我们的执法变得相当困难，我们应该把精力放在最有威胁的的罪犯身上。

信仰罗马天主教是一项特别严重的罪行。由于教宗否认了 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 统治的的合法性。因此所有的天主教徒，不论虔诚与否，都有可能是国家的叛徒。

像英国清教徒这样激进的异端，要是偏离教会教义太多，也可能遭到这些法规的针对。

该法律强化了$COUNTRY$ 的宗教统一性 ，但它也可以用来抑制宫廷内部的党派之争。只要对圣公宗稍稍出言不逊就可以毁掉一个人的名声。

original:
The Anglican Church does not require that its clergy devote much time to preaching. A monthly or even quarterly sermon is adequate according to the law, which is usually lifted directly from the Book of Homilies.

Many parishioners desire a more personal and involved approach to religious services, and have taken matters into their own hands by pooling money to pay for educated lecturers to preach in their towns. These lecturers however do not always have the most orthodox of theological views. It is often the case that the most eager to preach are those with the most radical ideas, and so these private sermons have become associated with the Puritan movement.

While there are advantages to a more religiously literate populace, cracking down on Puritanism would increase the authority of the Church.
translation:
圣公会并不强求其神职人员投入大量时间去传道。每月甚至每季布道一次按规矩来说都是可以的，而布道通常是直接借鉴布道书。

许多教区居民希望享有一种更私人的、更有参与性的宗教服务，他们动手募集资金延请受过教育的讲师到自己的城镇布道。然而这些讲师并不全都是持有正统的神学观。而通常情况下布道最狂热的往往是那些持有激进思想的人，这些私人的布道就和清教徒运动牵连起来。

尽管让更多民众虔诚信教读文识字有很多好处，但严厉打击清教能增加教会的权威。

original: Let them preach as they wish.
translation: 让他们随心所欲地布道吧。

original: The [Root.GetAdjective] Parliament is often called upon to debate matters of religion. Typically, the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will propose a new wave of reforms for the Anglican Church and the Parliament will take a stance along established factional lines; the Members in the Commons more likely to support radical or even Puritan measures, the Lords temporal more likely to favour a more conservative approach. Rarely does the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] get their way precisely, and when they do coercive measures are often involved.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective] 国会经常会因为宗教事务被召集。通常来说，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]会提出一项圣公宗的新改革动议，而国会议员则根据自身立场摆出姿态；下议院通常会支持更加激进甚至是清教徒的观点，而上议院通常更加青睐保守的手段。[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 极少能完全称心如意，除非使用了强制的手段。

original: Pass the reforms exactly as the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] proposed.
translation: 就像[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]提议的那样通过改革。
上议院赢得了今天的胜利。

original: Dissatisfied with the conservative establishment of the Anglican Church, a group of Puritans writing under the pseudonym ‘Martin Marprelate’ began publishing a series of scathing pamphlets directed at the Church leadership. The Bishops of $COUNTRY$, according to these writers, are ‘proud, popish, presumptuous, profane, paltry, pestilent and pernicious prelates’ who usurp authority from God.\n\nThese tracts have garnered public attention and risk making a mockery of the Establishment lest something be done about them.
translation: 因对圣公会的保守立场不满，一群清教徒以“马丁 马普雷拉特”为笔名开始出版针对教会领导权的一系列尖酸刻薄的小册子。根据这些作者的说法，$COUNTRY$ 的主教，是从上帝那里篡夺权力了的“骄傲，狂妄，亵渎，猥琐，可恶以及有害的天主教徒” 。\n\n这些文章引起了大众的关注并冒着被以蔑视当局的名义遭受处罚的风险。

original: Respond in kind, this is a war of pamphlets!
translation: 温和地回应，这也是一种方法

original: The doctrines of the Anglican Church are contained within the Book of Common Prayer. It is a book that needs periodic revisions to accord with changes in Anglican thought, as it shifts between more radical and more traditional theology. The most recent edition contains material that has greatly angered the people of [prayer_book_province.GetName], many of whom still cling to Catholic dogmas and practices. They have risen up in revolt, demanding that the Book be reverted to its previous edition.
translation: 圣公宗的教义已在公祷书中写明。这本书需要定期修订来适应圣公宗思想的演进，它在更加激进和更加传统的神学之间不停转变。最新版的内容大大触怒了[prayer_book_province.GetName]的人民，许多人依然坚守天主教的教条跟习俗。他们发起了叛乱，要求公祷书退回到之前一个版本。

original: Repeal the new edition and make traditionalist concessions.
translation: 抵制新变化，对传统主义做出让步。

original: We will not tolerate papist treason!
translation: 我们不会宽恕天主教徒的叛国罪！
秘密信奉天主教的官员

original: The [Root.GetAdjective] Reformation did not sway the hearts and minds of the entire population. Many continue to harbour Catholic sympathies, even among the court. It has been discovered that $STATESMAN$ has been secretly attending a Catholic Mass, a practice strictly forbidden by law. If exposed they stand to lose all of their land and property, and will no longer be eligible for public office.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective] 改革并未能成功拂动所有人的心灵。 许多人依然同情天主教，甚至在宫廷中也是如此。最近 $STATESMAN$ 被发现秘密参加天主教弥撒，而这是被法律所禁止的。 一旦曝光，违法者将失去所有的土地和财产，并永远无法担任公职。
它们太有用了，就现在而言。
我的宫廷不允许天主教徒！

original: When $COUNTRY$ broke with Rome, we did away with the superstitious notion that prayers should be directed to the Saints rather than to God himself. As our new theology has no place for the papist concept of Purgatory, there is no need for Saints to intercede on behalf of our souls. Despite this, many people continue the practice of praying to Saints, and many churches give excessive reverence to their patron.
translation: 当$COUNTRY$与罗马教廷决裂，我们挥别了以下迷信的陋习：教徒必须被圣人引导，而非是上帝自身。我们的新神学中没有炼狱的概念，因此圣人不需要为我们的罪恶灵魂说情。尽管如此，许多人依然在向圣人祷告，许多教堂依旧对他们有过度的尊崇。

original: It's harmless, we can allow this.
translation: 它是无害的，我们允许这样做。

original: The Catholic liturgical calendar is filled with feast days that function as public holidays and occasions for celebration. No longer under Papal authority, our own Church must decide how far this practice ought to continue. Those most fervent reformers argue that superfluous holidays encourage sinful temptation and distract from gainful labour. This has been met with broad agreement in terms of theology, but abolishing feast days is likely to upset the populace who do so enjoy the occasional day off.
translation: 天主教礼拜仪式充满了作为公共假日和庆祝活动的节日。我们自己的教会不应继续受教宗权威的影响，必须自行决定这种做法应该持续多久。最狂热的改革家们认为，多余的假日会鼓励有罪的诱惑，并从有报酬的劳动中分心。这已经在神学方面达成了广泛的协议，但是废除节日的日子可能会让那些偶尔享受一天休假的民众感到不安。

original: The Puritans have for some time criticized the hierarchy and doctrines of the Church of $COUNTRY$. The Reformation has to their eyes merely replaced the Pope with the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and they openly denounce the state’s slothful attitude to reform. Theological disputes aside, Puritans have also been persecuted as nonconformists, depending on the leanings of the current [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. Finally exhausted by the religious affairs of Europe, many Puritans have decided to migrate in the New World. They have organised themselves into a colonial company an requested a charter to establish new settlements in the Americas.
translation: 清教徒已经持续批判 $COUNTRY$国教会的等级制度和宗教学说。在他们眼里所谓的宗教改革不过是把教宗的位置替换给了 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] ，他们公开讨伐政权对宗教改革的懈怠。除了神学上的争议，清教徒还以非国教徒的名义被迫害， 一切只取决于 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的认知。在被欧洲的宗教事务折腾得精疲力尽之后，许多清教徒决定往新大陆移民。他们自我组织了一个殖民地公司，并准备在美洲建立新的定居点。

original: Integrate them into an established colony.
translation: 将它们整合到一个已建立的殖民地中。

original: Let them build their own settlement.
translation: 让他们建立自己的殖民地。

original: The matter of clerical vestments remains a contentious issue in the Anglican Church. The extravagant and superstitious rags of the papists are surely to be done away with, but the degree of austerity required of the clergy continues to inflame debate and protest.\n\nConservative Anglicans wish to reinstate some of the elaborate trappings of the old Catholic priesthood, while moderates argue that a simple surplice is sufficient. Radical reformers insist that vestments are not merely lacking scriptural support, but deface and corrupt the ordinances which God has instituted.
translation: 英国国教圣公会仍就神职人员的圣衣争执不休。教皇派奢侈又迷信的破布肯定要被废除，但神职人员的圣衣该有多简朴这一问题仍在引发争论和抗议。\n\n偏向保守主义的圣公会教徒希望恢复一些古老的天主教神父的精心装饰，而温和派则认为简单的袍子就足够了。激进的改革者则坚持认为，圣衣不仅缺乏经文的支持，而且还是对上帝所制订的律礼的腐化和破坏。
允许传统形式的教士法衣。
公开声明废除教士法衣。

original: The early years of the English Reformation are a time of fervent iconoclasm. Any adornment or relic that even suggests Papism, the existence of Purgatory, or the divinity of saints is being ruthlessly stripped from the churches. Anything that could lead the laity astray must be destroyed; altars are smashed, paintings painted over, shrines ruined.\n\nA perpetual issue for the new Anglican Church is the matter of how far this iconoclasm should be taken. Some more radical reformers push for an end to roods, candlesticks, and crucifixes, while others seek the restoration of some of the more harmless ornaments.
translation:
英国早期的宗教改革是一个破坏偶像主义盛行的时代。任何暗示了罗马天主教，炼狱或圣人的神性的装饰和遗迹都被无情地从教堂中抹除了。任何能使信众误入歧途的东西都必须被摧毁；

祭坛被打碎，绘画被涂改，神殿被毁灭。

对于新成立的英国圣公会来说，最大的问题就是这个运动该进行到什么样一个程度。一些激进的改革家们要求废除十字架，烛台和基督像，而另一些人则试图使用一些更人畜无害的装饰品。

original: Smash the altars and imprison papist protesters!
translation: 摧毁祭坛，关押抗议的教皇派人！

original: Destroy only what is undeniably papist.
translation: 只杀死确凿无疑的天主教徒

original: Put an end to this iconoclasm.

Though $COUNTRY$ has formally split from the Rome, the Pope continues to meddle in our affairs by orchestrating plots against [Root.Monarch.GetName]. Jesuits and priests number among his agents, sheltered by traitorous recusants.\n\nThese crypto-Catholics employ cunning methods of hiding Papist agents from the law, deviously building secret areas behind walls, under the floorboards, and even in concealed underground passageways. Hiding in these 'priest holes' can injure or even suffocate their occupants, so they are at least unlikely to be able to make a quick escape once located.
translation: 尽管$COUNTRY$已经正式与罗马决裂， 教宗依然在通过策划针对[Root.Monarch.GetName]的阴谋来插手我们的事务。 他的代理人中有许多耶稣会会士和司铎， 叛国的不服国教者是他们的保护伞。\n\n这些天主教秘密教徒用狡猾的手段帮教皇派的手下逃脱法律的制裁， 把他们秘密地藏在墙壁中，地板下，甚至隐蔽的地下通道。但躲在这些「牧师洞穴」中有害健康，藏身者甚至因此窒息， 所以一旦我们找到其藏身处，躲藏者将难以快速逃离。

original: Conduct a national priest-hunt. Search every house!
translation: 发动全国性的神父狩猎。搜查每一栋房屋！

original: Find out where they're coming from

As the Protestant Reformation radically shifts the religious landscape of Europe, $COUNTRY$ must take a firm stance on its faith. This has of course provoked much discussion in court, with some favouring the Protestant cause and others defending the traditional religion.

[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName], however, has a novel idea for the creation of a different sort of Church. A Church with the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] as its Supreme Governor, a happy union of Church and state. Neither Protestant, Catholic, nor Reformed, it would take a flexible approach to doctrine as fits the circumstance.

Such a Church would have its advantages. No longer subject to any higher ecclesiastical authority, the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] could marry and divorce at will, determine the nation’s theological direction, and have the assurance that they are appointed to rule directly by God.
translation:
正当新教改革大幅度地更改了欧洲的宗教版图， $COUNTRY$ 必须表明自己信仰的坚定立场。这当然会在宫廷引发许多讨论， 有些人喜欢新教而另一些人会捍卫旧教。

[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]， 却有个新奇的点子：建立不同的教会。这个教会将以 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 作为最高领袖，形成教会和国家幸福的联盟。 既非新教，也非天主教，亦非改革宗， 在教义上它将采取灵活的方式来适应不同环境。

这样的教会自有它的优势。不再臣服于任何最高宗教权威， [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 可随自己心愿结婚或者离婚， 决定国家的神学走向，并确认自己的统治是直接授权自上帝。

original: Evangelise the new Church to the world!
This sounds like a poor basis for a religion.
translation: 这听起来像一个毫无根底的宗教。

original: There will not be another opportunity to convert to Anglicanism.
translation: 错过这次机会就再无可能皈依圣公宗。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] has landed in the unenviable position of being both a religious nonconformist and the Supreme Governor of the Church of $COUNTRY$. The Anglicans of $COUNTRY$ struggle to tolerate this state of affairs, and the legitimacy of the Church is dramatically weakened.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName] 令人艳羡地同时身为非国教信徒和 $COUNTRY$ 教会最高领袖。 $COUNTRY$ 的圣公会信徒正痛苦地试图容忍目前的状况，而教会的正统性则被大幅地削弱。

original: This will be a difficult adjustment.
translation: 这将是一个困难的调整。
君主必须是圣公宗教徒。
不信奉国教的新教徒被激怒了

original: The state has forced the monarch to convert to the Anglican faith, greatly angering nonconformist Christians in our nation.
translation: 国家迫使君主转信为英国国教，这极大地激怒了我们国家的新教徒。

original: We are using recusancy laws to imprison political threats within the country.
translation: 我们正在用复仇法来监禁国内的政治威胁。

original: The House of Commons has undue influence over doctrinal issues in the state Church.
translation: 下议院在宗教问题上越过了界限。

original: We are reverting changes to the Book of Common Prayer to appease a popular revolt against reforms.
translation: 为了平息反对改革的叛乱，我们正在恢复对公祷书的修改。

original: Despite the theological problems with the practice, we are allowing people to address prayers to Saints.
translation: 忽视那些神学传统吧！现在主的羔羊能向圣徒祷告了！

original: In accordance with Anglican doctrine, praying to Saints rather than directly to God is considered heretical.
translation: 按照圣公会的教义，向圣徒祈祷而不是直接向上帝祈祷被认为是异端。

original: Superfluous religious holidays have been abolished.
translation: 不必要的宗教节日已经被废除。

original: We have re-instituted some of the old liturgical feast days, giving our citizens some much needed days off.
translation: 我们重新设立了一些旧的礼拜节日，为我们的公民提供了一些必需的休息日。

original: Puritans are flocking to our colonies in he Americas, having been denied a settlement of their own.
translation: 被赶离自己的住处后，清教徒们蜂拥到美洲殖民地。

original: This settlement is inhabited by Puritans wishing to establish their own religious communities.
translation: 这个定居点住满了希望建立自己宗教社区的清教徒。
安立甘宗的破坏偶像主义

original: People are enthusiastically destroying Papist icons throughout our country.
translation: 人民在满腔热情地销毁遍及我国的天主教偶像。

original: Catholic instigators in our country are an ever-present threat. We are organizing a national effort to find Catholic priests in hiding.
translation: 天主教煽动者在我国是一个一直存在的威胁，我们正在组织一项全国性的工作来寻找藏起来的天主教徒。

original: We are determined to spread the Anglican faith beyond our borders. Being a state Church, this has harmed our international reputation.
translation: 我们决定把圣公会信仰传播出国界。因为仅是一国国教，此举已经损害了我们的国际威望。
无视这些马普雷拉特宣传册

original: We refuse to acknowledge the ramblings of these Puritans.
translation: 我们拒绝承认这些清教徒的流言。

original: We are responding in kind to the poisononous invective of the Marprelate pamphlets.
translation: 对于这些马普雷拉特宣传册上恶毒的谩骂，我们回应以宽容。
囚禁笔名马普雷拉特的反革命作家

original: The publication of heresy against the Church cannot be tolerated, we are working to find and imprison the authors of the Marprelate tracts.
translation: 对教会的亵渎是不可容忍的，我们正在努力寻找并囚禁马普雷拉特宣传册的作者。

original: The clergy are donning more elaborate vestments in public. This is of course very impressive.
translation: 牧师在公众场合穿戴上了更加精致的法衣。此举令人印象深刻。

original: The Monarch is Supreme Governor of the Church, yet does not follow the faith.
translation: 君主是教会的最高主宰，但没有遵奉国教。

original: Our unwillingness to hunt down those that would spread propaganda against the state has resulted in some discontent throughout our country.
translation: 我们不愿意追捕那些散布谣言以对抗国家的人，这使得我国各地产生了不满。

original: Schools open for the poor and uneducated masses are being funded by a local philantropist and the religious establishment in this province. While this is doing wonders for popular literacy it also tends to put some strange ideas in the heads of people, not to mention strengthen the power of the church.
translation: 为穷人和未受过教育的群众开放的学校由当地的慈善家和该省的宗教机构资助。虽然这给大众的识字带来了奇迹，但它也倾向于在人们的头脑中提出一些奇怪的想法，更不用说加强教会的力量了。
支持新成立的科学学会。

original: We have given our patronage to a new scientific society, eager to work for the betterment of our country.
translation: 为了国家的利益，我们已经给这些科学学会赞助了。

original: The people of this province are unsatisfied with what they see as the ungodly behaviour of those studying anatomy and dissecting fresh corpses for the furtherment of science.
translation: 该省人民对于那些学习和解剖尸体的渎神行为-尽管是为了科学发展而进行的-十分反感

original: A number of institutions in the country are teaching outside of established religious doctrine.
translation: 国内一些机构正在已成规矩的教条之外进行教学。
惩罚亵渎神明的自然哲学家

original: A treatise on natural philosophy offended the religious sensibilities of the population. The author has therefore been punished severely.
translation: 一篇关于自然哲学的论著冒犯了人们的宗教情感。因此，作者受到了严厉的处罚。
宗教被自然哲学家嘲笑

original: A recent treatise has mocked the religious establishment in a scandalous fashion. Though publication was allowed, it has caused offence among the faithful.
translation: 最近的一篇论文讽刺了宗教机构的丑闻。 虽然它被允许发布了，但它冒犯到了虔诚的教徒。

original: Coffee houses are popular throughout the nation, acting as gathering points for intellectuals to debate their ideas.
translation: 咖啡屋在全国流行蔓延，知识分子们聚集于此辩论他们的想法。

original: Coffee houses were spreading dangerous ideas among the population. They have rightfully been banned.
translation: 咖啡屋在民众中传播过于危险的思想。他们应当被查封。

original: A collection of wondrous and curious items from around the world is being arranged and displayed by the state.
translation: 国家正在安排展示来自世界各地的奇珍异玩。

original: With the spread of Popular Literacy a great number of cheap minor publications; pamphlets, chapbooks and similar, have begun to circulate in greater numbers. While many of them are just popular ballads, stories or gossip, some are thinly veiled attempts at criticizing the pillars of our state, and the religious establishment.\nThe spread of a particularly immoral and political ballad has led to demands that we limit the press more harshly and that we take disloyal printers and their products into our care.
translation: 随着平民识字率的提高，大量廉价小出版物，如手册、小诗歌集和小故事书等开始大规模流通。尽管其中不少是民谣、故事和八卦，但也有一些是对我国国家体制、宗教制度的露骨批判。\n一首极其道德败坏的政治性歌谣正广为流传，有些人因此提出应加大对出版业的审查力度，把那些不忠的出版商及其他们的出版物纳入监管。

original: It is just a piece of paper.

As a member of the cabinet [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName] has had good opportunity to expand on [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis] personal interests. As a result [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis] manor outside [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] boasts one of the largest laboratories in the country, with many furnaces, and large stores of all kinds of materials imaginable. [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHeCap] is also particularly proud of what [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe] calls [Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis] ‘chamber of wonders’, a large office filled with curiosities from roof to floor, as well as a library dedicated to explaining the objects. Such habits do not come cheap however and as our dear minister asks for a place to study the moon and the stars as well, a tailor made castle observatory, some feel that perhaps this should be the limit of our generosity.
translation: 作为内阁成员，对于[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetName]是个满足个人利益的好机会。[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetHerHis]在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]郊外的庄园拥有全国最大的实验室之一，配备许多火炉和储藏各种原材料的仓库。[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHeCap]尤其引以为豪的还有[Root.Adm_Advisor.GetSheHe]所说的“奇迹房”，那是一个从房顶到地板都充满令人好奇的物品的房间，还有一座用于解释这些神奇物品的图书馆。然而这样的习惯并不等于占便宜。我们敬爱的大臣还要有个地方观察行星月亮，一名裁缝就把城堡改造成了天文台，有人觉得我们的大度应该是有限度的。

original: Anything for the betterment of [Root.GetAdjective] science!
Clearly the money could be put to better use.
translation: 金钱显然可以被更好地利用

original: Local doctors in [doctor_province.GetCapitalName] have begun to pay good money to study fresh corpses. The physicians claim this allows them to improve their knowledge of the human body, documenting it for the betterment of mankind. Improving the grasp of human anatomy is not an argument that impresses locals when the graves of recently deceased are found open in the morning however. The citizens of [doctor_province.GetCapitalName] are now demanding that we restrict these horrible practices and that we put a stop to the grave robbers.
translation: [doctor_province.GetCapitalName]的医生已经开始斥资研究新鲜尸体。医生们声称这是为了获取更多有关人体的知识，对人体的详尽记录会对全人类有益。然而对在早晨发现刚去世亲人的坟墓已被刨开的当地居民来说，「加深对人类解剖学的理解」这个理由缺少说服力。[doctor_province.GetCapitalName]的居民现在要求我们限制这种可怖的行径，同时阻止盗墓者。

original: They can dissect the bodies of the convicted.
translation: 他们可以解剖罪犯的尸体。

original: Let us work to secure a constant supply of bodies for their work.
translation: 确保他们的工作有稳定持续的肉体。

original: A brilliant [inventor_country.GetAdjective] inventor from [inventor_country.GetName] has come to seek our patronage after a falling out with the [inventor_country.GovernmentName]. [Root.inventor.GetName] has been described by some as one of the great minds of this age, producing many mechanical and chemical inventions beyond the understanding of most others.
translation: 一位来自[inventor_country.GetName]的才华横溢的[inventor_country.GetAdjective]发明家在与[inventor_country.GovernmentName]意见不合后寻求我们的赞助。[Root.inventor.GetName]被一些人认为是这个时代的伟人之一，他创造了许多超出大多数人理解的机械和化学的发明。

original: We would not risk the anger of [inventor_country.GetDefiniteArticleBeforePluralCountry][inventor_country.GetName].

A religious local philanthropist has begun to create schools for poor children in [poor_province.GetName]. The ambition is to bring literacy to the poor and educate them in the way of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.\nOf course there are those who would argue that this is not an activity without risks.
translation: 一位[poor_province.GetName]当地的宗教慈善家开始给穷人的孩子们办学。 目标是让穷人识字并用[Root.Religion.GetName]的信仰教化他们。\n当然，有些人认为此举尚且存在危险性。

original: Among some of our [Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments] it has become increasingly fashionable to spend time on experimentation and philosophy. Some have begun to form regular discussion groups while others use letters to correspond with other inquisitive minds.\nOne such group has contacted our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], asking for patronage and support. They insist that such endorsement will bring great benefits to the [Root.GovernmentName] in the near future.
translation: 在我们的一些[Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments]中，将时间用在实验和哲学思考上变得愈发流行。一些人结成了定期碰面的讨论团体，其他人则通过书信与同样充满求知欲的心灵交流思想。\n这些团体中的一个已经联系了我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，寻求资助和支持。他们坚称我们的支持会很快为[Root.GovernmentName]带来巨大的收益。
他们将获得我们的支持。

original: The university of [university_province.GetName] has attracted a new strand of teachers and students who are eager to modernize the institution. They are asking for funding to open a new college where they can further develop what they call ‘new science’, with a more experimental outlook and what they claim to be a less dogmatic approach to the world.\nOf course within the existing academy there is some resistance to these would-be reformers. They argue that the money could be better spent supporting the existing institution as new ideas are not necessarily better ideas.
translation: [university_province.GetName]的大学吸引了一批新的师生，他们迫切期望将其现代化。他们要求投资一个新学院，以便研究所谓的“新科学”，以一种更注重实验的视角和他们认为更脱离教条的方法来探究世界。\n当然在现有的科研人员中，有些反对这些改革的提倡者。他们认为这些资金应该用于支持现有研究机构，因为新的思想未必会更好。

original: Enlarge the University? Sounds like a good idea.
translation: 扩大大学规模？听起来是个好主意。

original: Let us listen to the conservatives.
translation: 让我们听听保守党的意见.

original: Institutions of higher learning typically restrict enrollment to adherents of the dominant faith. This forces nonconforming prospective students to seek their education outside of state-sanctioned universities. Thankfully for them, a number of informal academies have been founded in $COUNTRY$ that cater to religious dissidents of various sorts, often promoting a particular theological position. Such academies may strictly be at odds with the law, as schools generally require the assent of local or national religious authorities, but they provide education to students who would otherwise be barred from admission.
translation: 高等教育机构的录取通常限定主流宗教的信徒，使得不合要求的希望入学的学生考虑非国家赞助的大学。所幸，$COUNTRY$有一系列针对不同宗教信徒的非正规学院，往往与某种神学意识形态挂钩。由于学校通常要求当地或国家宗教机构批准，他们的运作或许违反了法律，但是它们为不符合入学条件的学生提供了教育。

original: Let them teach as they please.

translation: 必须强制实行宗教同意。

original: A promising thinker to some, a dangerous instigator to others, [Root.scientist.GetName] has recently published a new work of natural philosophy, showing that it is very likely that many of the things we have held evident up until now might in fact be wrong. To make matters worse the thinker has also used the opportunity provided by the publication to mock the religious establishment. Taken together this has created a strong aversion against these new ideas, with some arguing that [Root.scientist.GetName] should be incarcerated and punished, while others at the very least distance themselves from the text.
translation: 一个前途无量的思想家，同时对其他人来说也是一个危险的的煽动者， [Root.scientist.GetName] 最近出版了一本新的自然哲学著作，这本书表明我们所掌握的许多东西很有可能直到现在才被证明是错误的。综上所述，这导致了许多人对这些新观点的强烈反感，有些人认为 [Root.scientist.GetName] 应该被监禁和惩罚，而其他人起码要远离这篇著作。
我们不能容忍这种亵渎！

original: Like many rulers of this age [Root.Monarch.GetName] has wanted to surround [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] with great minds that can debate the secrets of the world. Some poses great wit and excell at debates, while others are more suited for solitary experiments or mathematical calculations. There is no doubt quite a bit of rivalry at times, as the favor of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] can be a very beneficial thing to have for any thinker, scientist or inventor.\nOne such intelligent fool has lately come to be ridiculed by many peers. [Root.mathematician.GetName] has a great mind for mathematics but is a notably poor debater, and some would argue the reputation of the court suffers for indulging such work.
translation: 像这个时代的许多统治者一样，[Root.Monarch.GetName]想围绕着[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]他们伟大的思想可以改变这个世界。他们中的一些人在辩论当中提出了极其优秀的观点，而另外一些人便在科学领域当中给予证明。 这个时候便会有极大的竞争，并且得到了 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]对任何思想家、科学家或发明家都是有利的。\n一个科学家正遭到了同行的嘲笑。[Root.mathematician.GetName]虽然是一个优秀的数学家，但他极其不擅长辩论，一些人认为这样会影响到一些人的工作。

original: Scholars as ancient as Aristotle have theorized that there must exist a great unknown continent in the extreme south of the world. Now that traversing the globe has become dramatically more accessible, explorers, cartographers, and scientists are beginning to take an interest in the missing continent once again. They speculate that some of the islands thus far discovered in the region may be the terminus of large archipelagos. An expedition to the far south would be expensive, take a great deal of preparation, and test the limits of our seafaring technology.
translation: 亚里士多德学派的学者们认为，在世界的最南端，必定存在着一个巨大的未知大陆。现在，探索地球变得更加便利，探险者、制图师和科学家们再次开始对这个失落的大陆产生兴趣。根据他们推测，迄今为止在该地区发现的一些岛屿可能是大型群岛的界标。但是到遥远的南方去探险是很昂贵的，这需要做大量的准备工作，并发挥我们航海技术的极限。

original: Fund a research and exploratory expedition.
translation: 资助一场研究和探索考察。

original: This is a waste of time and resources.
translation: 这是在浪费时间和资源。

original: The introduction of coffee to $COUNTRY$ has hit the nation by storm, with coffee houses springing up in cities throughout the land. Miniscule admission fees ensure that the educated and uneducated, rich and poor alike can go to a coffee house and join the lively debates within. Popular topics of discussion include philosophy, politics, gossip, and finance. A natural meeting place for intellectuals, the coffee house is becoming synonymous with debate and learning.
translation: 咖啡如一场风暴席卷了$国家$，全国各地的城市都建立起了咖啡馆。少量的入场费确保不论是受教育者还是未受教育者，穷人还是富人都能去咖啡馆并加入那里激烈的辩论。讨论的热门话题涵盖了哲学，政治学，流言蜚语以及金融学。咖啡馆已经成为了知识分子们自然的聚会场所，并且逐步成为了辩论和学习的代名词。

original: With new developments in the art of glassmaking and metalwork comes the ability to create more refined scientific instruments. Lenses that magnify the very distant and the very small are invaluable to our astronomers and natural philosophers, while chemists hone their craft with more complex metal tools. Recent breakthroughs have given $COUNTRY$ a scientific edge in the production of this equipment. We can but eagerly await the discoveries that have been made possible.
translation: 随着玻璃制造和金属加工技术的新发展，创造了更精细的科学仪器的能力。放大遥远和非常小的透镜对我们的天文学家和自然哲学家来说是无价之宝，而化学家用更复杂的金属工具磨练他们的手艺。最近的突破使$国家$在生产这种设备方面取得了一个科学的优势。我们只能急切地等待那些已经成为可能的发现。

original: Can they turn lead into gold yet?
translation: 他们还能把铅变成黄金吗

original: A new flavour of economics, known as physiocracy, is becoming popular among the [Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments]. Physiocrats hold that the basis of wealth is agricultural production, by which all of civilization is made possible. The most important members of society therefore, are the landed gentry who own the fields and lease the land. The physiocrats reject the dominant economics of mercantilism in favour of an agrarian laissez faire approach; merchants of course do not generate wealth, but merely transport extraneous produce from place to place. While many find the depth of their economics impressive, others are more swayed by the tangible benefits of existing protectionist policies.
translation: 一种被称为“重农主义”的新经济观点正在[Root.GetNoblesReplacementForOtherGovernments]流行起来。重农主义者认为一切文明可能的农业产出才是最基本的财富。因此，重农主义者中最重要的人物是拥有土地并将其出租的乡绅。重农主义者反对重商主义的主导经济学，他们倾向于土地放任政策。他们认为，商人当然不能创造财富，只是将无关紧要的产品从一地运往另一地。虽然很多人都认为他们的经济学的深度令人惊讶，也有些人被现存的贸易保护政策带来的既得利益所动摇。

original: Perhaps this is worth a try.
Landowners have too many privileges already.
translation: 地主已经拥有太多特权了。

original: The exploration of new lands and the opening of trade with distant nations has brought all manner of curious objects to our shores. It has become fashionable to gather collections of these often bizarre items and display them alongside more mundane treasures such as portraits and religious icons. These fantastic collections include trophies from strange or mythical animals, artifacts from unknown cultures, rare minerals, and brightly-coloured shells from foreign shores. These cabinet exhibits are visited not only by curious aristocrats but also by naturalists interested in their scientific value. Of course it sometimes turns out that the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]’s prized unicorn horn is simply the tusk of a narwhal.
translation: 探索新的土地和与遥远的国家开放贸易，给我们的海岸带来了各种有趣的东西。收集这些奇珍并将它们与现世的珍品（如肖像画和圣像）一起展示已经成为时尚。这些精彩的收藏品包括来自奇怪或神话动物的奖杯，来自未知文化的文物，稀有矿物和来自外国海岸的鲜艳的贝壳。这些内阁展品不仅受到好奇的贵族们的欢迎，而且受到对其科学价值感兴趣的博物学家的参观。当然，有时候最终会发现[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]珍贵的独角兽角其实就是一个独角鲸的牙齿。

original: How very novel. Commission one immediately.
This is silly. We should patronise religious institutions instead.
translation: 这不是明智之举。我们应当保护宗教权益。

original: You may not enter into a state of war with someone you have a Steer Trade relation with.
translation: 你不能和被你引导贸易的国家进入战争状态。

original: $ACTOR$ is suggesting your merchants to Steer Trade towards them.\n\nIs this idea insane or does it have merit, all things considered?
translation: $ACTOR$ 建议你的商人将贸易转向他们。\n\n仔细思考，这是个智障的想法还是说其实有利可图？

original: Propose that their merchants should Steer Trade to you.
translation: 建议他们国家的商人将贸易引导给你。

original: Supposing they voluntarily agree to this while we are at war would be silly.
translation: 妄想他们在我们打仗时同意此事，这个想法太愚蠢了。

original: Do you wish the merchants in $WHO$ to Steer Trade to you, rather than for their own enrichment?
translation: 你希望$WHO$的商人将贸易引导给你，而不是让自己更加富有吗?

original: Considering the number of Trade nodes and Merchants in question, $X|Y$ out of $Y$ Merchants would be assigned to Steer Trade to you.
translation: 考虑到贸易节点与商人团的数量问题，该国$Y$支商人团中的$X|Y$支将被指派引导贸易与你。

original: Do you desire to stop requiring merchants of $WHO$ to Steer Trade here?
translation: 你想让$WHO$ 的商人把贸易引导到这儿吗?

original: Have you decided to end the Trade Steering to $WHO$ our merchants are forced to put up with?
translation: 你确定不再将贸易引导给 $WHO$ ？ 我们的商人正在被迫做这件事。

original: No longer require their merchants to Steer Trade to you!
translation: 不在需要他们的商人向你引导贸易！

original: No longer accept that our merchants Steer Trade towards $RECIPIENT$!
translation: 再也不接受我们的商人引导贸易到 $RECIPIENT$！

original: We will lose $PRESTIGEHIT|R$ prestige and $WHOS$ opinion about you will be damaged for some time, since this relation was enforced in a peace deal. $WHO$ will get a Trade Conflict Casus Belli on us.
translation: 我们将损失$PRESTIGEHIT|R$威望且$WHOS$对你的态度将会变差一段时间，因为这种关系通过和平条约期间强制执行的。 $WHO$将会得到对我们贸易冲突的战争借口。

original: Cannot stop Steering Trade to them while there is a truce.
translation: 休战期间无法停止向他们引导贸易。

original: A $SUBJECTTYPE$ must only Steer Trade to its Overlord.
translation: 一个 $SUBJECTTYPE$ 只能引导贸易到它的宗主国。

original: The merchants of $FROM$ will be forced to steer trade to $TO$, and this remains for the duration of the truce.
translation: $FROM$ 的商人将被强制引导贸易给 $TO$，并将持续到和约结束。

original: $FROM$ will no longer steer trade to $ORG$. Their merchants will instead steer trade to $TO$. This will remain active for the duration of the truce.
translation: $FROM$ 将不再引导贸易到 $ORG$。 他们的商人将转移贸易价值到 $TO$。这将会在休战期间保持活跃性。

original: Embracing $INSTITUTION$ will be sped up in the $SUBJECT$ capital area.
We will pay §R$PERCENT$%§! of $SUBJECT$ monthly income.
We are not paying for Knowledge Sharing.
translation: 我们没有为思潮分享支付费用。

original: Nobody is currently paying us for Knowledge Sharing.
translation: 目前没有人向我们支付思潮分享的费用。

original: A war has broken out, voiding all previous agreements!
translation: 战争爆发，此前所有协约作废！

original: There is no further knowledge of an Institution to share.
translation: 没有更多知识可以共享了。

original: $RECIPIENT$ is no longer the subject of $ACTOR$.
Currently sharing $INSTITUTION|Y$, which may last until $DATE|Y$.
translation: 立刻分享 $INSTITUTION|Y$，直到 l $DATE|Y$ 结束。

original: Embracing $INSTITUTION$ will be sped up in the $RECIPIENT$ capital area.

By paying §R$PERCENT$%§! of their income ($INCOME|Y$ ¤) each month, growth of our oldest established Institution unembraced by them (currently $INSTITUTION|Y$) will be accelerated by $GROWTH$ per month in their capital area.
translation: 通过每月支付他们收入($INCOME|Y$ ¤)的§R$PERCENT$%§!，对于我们早已接受而他们未接受的思潮（目前是$INSTITUTION|Y$），在他们的首都地区的接受度每月将增长$GROWTH$。

original: Do you wish to proceed offering $COUNTRY|Y$ Knowledge Sharing? Should they accept, they will pay us §G$PERCENT$%§! of their income ($INCOME|Y$ ¤) every month. Meanwhile, growth of our oldest established Institution unembraced by them (currently $INSTITUTION|Y$) will be accelerated by $GROWTH$ per month in their capital area.
translation: 你希望提供$COUNTRY|Y$思潮分享吗？如果他们接受，他们每月支付收入的§G$PERCENT$%§!（$INCOME|Y$¤）给我们。同时，在他们的首都地区，我们早已接受而他们尚未接受的思潮（$INSTITUTION|Y$）的接受度每月增长速度会加快$GROWTH$。

original: The agreement expires once $YEARS|Y$ years have passed, no further knowledge can be transferred, or we end up on opposing sides of a war, whichever happens first.
translation: 协议将在$YEARS|Y$年后失效，在此之后不会再有更多可传授的知识，如果我们在战争中加入对立方，则会提前终止。
超过殖民范围 (从任何省份)。

original: There is no Institution they can learn from us about.
translation: 我们没有什么思潮可供他们学习。

original: We are already Sharing Knowledge with @$TAG$ $NAME$ until $EXPIRY$.
translation: 我们已经分享思潮给@$TAG$$NAME$，持续到$EXPIRY$为止。

original: We cannot offer Share Knowledge while @$TAG$ $NAME$ Shares Knowledge with us.
translation: 当@$TAG$$NAME$分享思潮给我们时我们不能分享思潮。

original: They are already involved in Knowledge Sharing with @$TAG$ $NAME$ until $EXPIRY$.
translation: 他们已经参与了与@$TAG$$NAME$的思潮分享，持续到$EXPIRY$为止。

original: This can only be canceled by war until it expires $DATE|Y$.
translation: 思潮分享在$DATE|Y$到期后或发生战争时才可以被取消  。
（已经开始和他们分享思潮，持续到$EXPIRY$为止。）

original: Offer to Share Knowledge regarding our Institutions' technological advances.
translation: 提供思潮分享要求我们的科技等级领先。

original: The sophisticated affluents of $COUNTRY|Y$ are giving us the chance to catch up in technological progress via the means of Knowledge Sharing, giving us $GROWTH$ growth towards $INSTITUTION$ in our capital area provinces. Naturally, a monthly fee at §R$PERCENT$%§! of our income ($FEE$ ¤) will be paid by us if we accept.
translation: $COUNTRY|Y$的渊博智者们通过思潮分享的形式给我们一个赶超科技水平的机会，在我们首都地区的省份对于$INSTITUTION$增加$GROWTH$的接受度。当然，如果我们接受，每月需付出收入的§R$PERCENT$%§!（$FEE$ ¤）。

original: No Naval Doctrine selected.\n\nWhen we have reached the Force Limit to support a formidable navy, we can select a national Doctrine for our brave seamen to follow. This will grant our navy a specific permanent advantage.
translation: 没有选择海军学说。\n\n我们的海军已经足够强大，现在可以选择一个学说来让我们勇敢的水手效仿。这将提供我们海军一个特殊的永久优势。

original: §RYou must have a Naval Force Limit of at least $VALUE$ to be able to change your Naval Doctrine.§!
translation: §R你必须具有至少$VALUE$的海军规模上限才能更改你的海军学说。§!

original: Selecting this Naval Doctrine will cost you $COST|Y2$¤ due to your navy having a capacity of $SAILORS|Y0$ Sailors.
translation: 由于你的海军拥有$SAILORS|Y0$水手的规模，选择这一海军学说将花费你$COST|Y2$¤。

original: §RThis Naval Doctrine is not available to you:§!

Are you sure you want to set your Naval Doctrine to $DOCTRINE|Y$?\nThis will cost you $COST|Y2$¤ due to your navy having a capacity of $SAILORS|Y0$ Sailors and give you the following permanent effect:
translation: 你确定想将海军学说设定为$DOCTRINE|Y$?\n由于你的海军拥有$SAILORS|Y0$水手的规模，这将花费你$COST|Y2$¤，并赋予你以下永久性效果：

original: Your current doctrine $DOCTRINE|Y$ will be removed and you will lose its benefits.
translation: 你将移除当前学说$DOCTRINE|Y$并失去其加成。

original: §RYou cannot afford to change your Naval Doctrine right now.§!
translation: §R你负担不起改变你的海军学说的花费。§!

original: Your current doctrine $DOCTRINE|Y$ will be removed and you will lose its benefits when you select this doctrine.
translation: 当你选择这项海军学说时，你目前的学说  $DOCTRINE|Y$  将被移除并且将失去它的收益。

original: Our naval influence shall be felt without the expense of our fleet leaving port except under the most favorable of conditions.
translation: 除了在最有利的条件下，不应冒着舰队离港的风险，这样才能维持我们海军的威慑力。

original: We shall fight the temptation to have slaves and the condemned rowing our Galleys. Free men, resilient in the face of adversity and resistant to defection shall form the muscle of our navy.
translation: 我们将抗拒让奴隶划船的诱惑。自由人，在逆境中具有弹性并且能够抵抗叛变，这将成为我们海军的力量。

original: Our fleet's prime directive is to serve the financial interests of the State. Every effort shall be made to ensure our cargo ships are laden with foreign riches.
translation: 我们舰队的指导原则是服务于国家的经济利益。应当尽一切努力来确保我们的商船载满来自其他国家的财富。

original: With established Prize Law and generous Letters of Marque we will nurture a custom of seizing enemy ships intact.
translation: 伴随着捕获法的建立以及捕拿特许证的普及，我们培育起了一种完好俘获敌军船舶的传统。

original: In a world of rapid change the seas remain of crucial importance to our nation. Both as means to secure our dominance and as the first line of defense our wooden wall shall prevail.
translation: 在这个瞬息万变的世界里，海洋对我们的国家至关重要。作为确保我们的统治地位的手段，并且作为第一道防线，我们的舰队应该占得先机。

original: We have reached a high enough naval force limit to be able to select a Naval Doctrine giving us permanent naval bonuses.
translation: 我们的海军已经足够强大，现在可以选择一个海军学说来给我们的海军一个永久加成。

original: Our neighbors are more technologically advanced than us, causing our Innovativeness to change by $VAL|R$ per month.
translation: 我们邻居的技术比我们更先进，导致我们的创新度每月改变 $VAL|R$ 。

original: \n\nPicking this idea now will increase our §YInnovativeness§! with $VAL|G$.
translation: \n\n现在选择这个理念将会使我们的§Y创新度§!增加$VAL|G$。

original: \nResearching this Technology now will increase our §YInnovativeness§! with $VAL|G$.
translation: \n现在研究这项科技将使我们的§Y创新度§!增加$VAL|G$。

original: It currently changes by $VAL|3R$/month due to other countries being more technologically advanced than us.\n
translation: 由于其他国家在技术上比我们更先进，目前它变化了 $VAL|3R$/月。\n

original: It currently changes by $VAL|3G$/month due to us being technologically ahead in time.\n
translation: 由于我们在技术上超前，它目前变化了 $VAL|3G$/月。\n

original: Merchants can not be moved while we are Steering Trade to $TO$.
translation: 不能移动商人当我们引导贸易给 $TO$。

original: (There are insufficient Trade nodes to auto-assign this merchant to Trade Steering.)
translation: （缺少贸易节点来自动分配这个商人转移贸易。）

original: $VAL$ ships captured with Boarding Naval Doctrine.
translation: 选择登船作战海军学说并俘获$VAL$艘舰船。

original: Religious fanatics tend to rise up in provinces controlled by nations of a different faith. They seek to spread their faith and smite all unbelievers.
translation: 宗教狂信徒往往在受控于异信仰国家的省份掀起叛乱。他们意图传播其信仰并打击所有的非信徒。

original: The religious rebels fight for the $RELIGION$ religion. They demand that we recognize its supremacy or at the very least cease our efforts to convert them and let them worship in peace.
translation: 宗教叛军为$RELIGION$奋战。他们要求我们承认其宗教的优越性或至少不再试图使其改宗并让他们安宁地进行礼拜。

original: Your Consort will be divorced.\nRoyal Marriages will not end.
translation: 你的配偶将会离婚。\n但皇室联姻不会中断。

original: Less than §Y$NUM$§! provinces in the Empire under the control of non-member states or subjects of non-member states.
translation: 少于 §Y$NUM$§! 的帝国省份不在成员国或其附庸国的控制之内。

original: §Y$NUM$§! provinces in the Empire under the control of non-member states or subjects of non-member states.
translation: 有§Y$NUM$§!个帝国省份在非成员国或非成员国附庸的控制下。

original: The Duchy of France must bow to us in perpetuity.
translation: 法兰西的各公国必须永远臣服于我们。
我们现在达到了 $AMOUNT|Y$ 点创新度。

original: Our innovativeness is being modified by the following:\n
translation: 我们的创新度受以下因素影响：\n

original:
Innovativeness can be increased by:
First in Technology: §G+2§!
First in Idea: §G+1§!
Ahead of Time: §G+0.005§!/month

Innovativeness can be decreased by:
Behind Neighbors: §R-0.03§!/month
translation:
创新度增加由于：
首先研究科技：§G+2§!
首先开理念：§G+1§!
领先于时代：§G+0.005§!/月

创新度减少由于：
落后于邻国：§R-0.03§!/月
\n我们目前的创新度带来的效果：\n$MOD$

original: \nThe technology level $TECH|Y$ was reached first at $DATE|Y$.
translation: \n科技水平首先达到了 $TECH|Y$ 于 $DATE|Y$。

original: Only $OWNED_ISLAND_PROVINCES$ out of $ISLAND_PROVINCES$ island provinces are owned.\n

translation: 完成任务 $MISSION|Y$ 但不会得到奖励

original: Own, or have a non-Tributary Subject own all provinces without a direct land connection to Stockholm, Panama or Guugu Yimithirr.
translation: 自身或非朝贡属国拥有所有与斯德哥尔摩、巴拿马或辜古依密舍没有陆地直接相连的省份。

original: Do NOT have the active province modifier
§RArmies cannot be Conformed to Templates when movement is locked.§!
translation: §R 当移动被锁定时，舰队无法被整合。§!

original: §RFleets cannot be Conformed to Templates when movement is locked.§!
translation: §R当移动被锁定时，舰队无法被整合。§!

original: Fort is not controlled by you or your allies.
translation: 堡垒不受你或你的盟友控制。

original: The king has returned to Gonder.
